Name: Thomaz
About the game: Our princess has been kidnapped by a demonic wizard. Mike is not the first one who tries to save her; but he will be the last! Play against the enemies which getting harder each level, and defeat the wizard to get the princess. Also includes a secondary mode to collect beets, and a co-op mode to do this with a friend. Features: More than 20 levels to play. 800+ achievements. Achievements with special characters like ä, ë, ç. More than 4 different enemies. A co-op mode to play the secondary mode with a friend.
